column3: Honey: Released March 22, 2017, by the National Agricultural Statistics Service (NASS), Agricultural Statistics Board, United States Department of Agriculture (USDA).
Pollination and Other Income – United States: 2015 and 2016

[Operations that qualify as a farm. Represents incomes from the total number of colonies, regardless of whether honey was harvested. For more estimates on the total number of colonies, see the Honey Bee Colonies" report]"
